body.name: canhard Unbreakable Full Length Wall Mirror for Kids,Self Adhesive Mirrors for Wall,4 Pcs 10"x10",Made of Shatterproof Plexiglass Acrylic,Kids Body Mirrors Tiles for Bedroom, Hallway, Living Room
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 54 mins
features: (Advanced Materials): Made of plexiglass, shatterproof, can be bent, it will not be damaged if accidentally dropped on the ground, very safe, your kids and pets can play with peace of mind

(Mirror size):Full length mirror each mirror tile is 4 Pcs 10 x 10 inch, thick : 0.08 inch, mirror full length about 40"L x 10"W, it is useful foR DIY, door mirror the image is clear and undistorted, can decorate your house and illuminate your beauty,our workout mirror is not a real glass mirror.0.5 meter distance will be the best effect of look like mirror, far from 0.5 meters may look like distorting mirrors.baby kids will have fun for the funny face think mirror like a magic mirror
(Easy to install): The package comes with double-sided foam tape.It can be easily installed on smooth walls, latex painted walls, light perforated tile walls, furniture or wooden doors
(Applicable Scenes):Mirror can be used as children's playroom, bedroom, closet, door, small wall mirror for bedroom, body mirror,wall-mounted mirrors, classroom mirror,baby mirror
(Note): Before the first use, tear off a layer of protective film (if the protective film is not torn off, the mirror surface will be blurred).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great mirror put on my door cabinet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Acrylic mirror squares, Four piece, made in China.
reviews.reviewText: These are lightweight, non-glass mirrors. You peel off the plastic on the front and then stick the mirrors on a clean wall using the included adhesive squares. I recommend using a level, or at least a leveling app on your phone.The adhesive seems strong and these are sticking well so far, but it’s only been a few days.

reviews.reviewerName: i knew this was going to be other material besides glass , but the quality of it is terrible . It’s so blurry , it’s basically like looking at your reflection in a spoon . Would not recommend
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Blurry / bad quality
reviews.reviewText: I was going to use this for my daughters room , she is 6 and I thought this was a neat idea to put on her closet door . I don’t think I will be using it . It’s terrible quality . you can barely see yourself in this . It’s blurry , cheaply made , and over priced !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Should stick on most mostly even surfaces
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Easy to stick on. Comes with 4 mirrors and plenty of stickers. It’s slightly bigger than the photos but very clear and not so heavy.4 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Set of 4 very clear mirrors
reviews.reviewText: I needed a simple mirror to stick on the wall of my office, and these seemed like a nice option. I was surprised when a set of 4 arrived! They are each a decently large size. They have a protective film on the front that is easily removed. It also came with some sticky foam pieces to put it up on the wall.The actual mirror looks great! I was worried it might not be very clear, but it is perfectly reflective and not too heavy.I only need one, but I can see how using several of these together could be a nice decoration on a larger room as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice reflection with minimal distortion. I stuck this inside the door of our work trailer. I thought the adhesive seemed a bit weak, but since it hasn't fallen in over 2k miles of bouncing down the road my worries seem to be unfounded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These mirror panels are actually 11.75" squares. They come with double sided adhesive (1.25") square foam stickers. There are 36 stickers -- enough for nine per mirror. No other hanging options are included.It is recommended to only apply these to smooth surfaces, which makes sense. But my wall has textured paint. I didn't want to sand and repaint, so I took my chances. These mirrors have been hanging there without issue.I think "bendable" is a stretch, but these do have give and seem much more flexible than a sheet of glass. The reflections are clear, and the sides (and corners) of the mirrors are not sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Aaste of money
